name: Nexus-docs
body:
### Nexus has been deprecated

For current Globus API docs please see https://docs.globus.org/.

If you are a legacy user of the Nexus API please switch to using Globus Auth as soon as possible to avoid any service disruptions: https://docs.globus.org/api/auth/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
